00009 class ORJAMFADCDecoder : public ORVHistDecoder, public ORVBasicRDTreeDecoder
00010 {
00011   public:
00012     enum EJAMFADCConsts { kNCards = 32 };
00013 
00014     ORJAMFADCDecoder() {}
00015     virtual ~ORJAMFADCDecoder() {}
00016 
00017     virtual void Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord);
00018 
00019     virtual double ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record)
00020       { return (double) record[2]; }
00021     virtual inline size_t GetNChannels(UInt_t* record)
00022       { return LengthOf(record) - 3; }
00023     virtual inline UInt_t IthChannelOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iChannel)
00024       { return (record[3+iChannel] & 0xf0000) >> 16; }
00025     virtual inline UInt_t IthADCValueOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iChannel)
00026       { return record[3+iChannel] & 0xffff; }
00027 
00028     // for histograms
00029     virtual std::string GetHistName(int iHist);
00030     virtual std::string GetHistTitle(int iHist);
00031     virtual std::string GetXTitle() { return "ADC Value"; }
00032     virtual std::string GetYTitle() { return "Channel"; }
00033 
00034     virtual inline size_t GetNDim() { return 2; }
00035     virtual size_t GetNbinsX() { return 0xffff+1; }
00036     virtual size_t GetNbinsY() { return 0xf+1; }
00037 
00038     virtual inline int GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record) 
00039       { return CardOf(record) + kNCards*CrateOf(record); }
00040     virtual inline size_t GetNEntries(UInt_t* record)
00041       { return GetNChannels(record); }
00042 
00043     virtual inline double GetX(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00044       { return double(IthADCValueOf(record, i)); }
00045     virtual inline double GetY(UInt_t* record, size_t i) 
00046       { return double(IthChannelOf(record, i)); }
00047 
00048     // for basic trees
00049     virtual size_t GetNPars() { return 4; }
00050     virtual std::string GetParName(size_t iPar);
00051     virtual size_t GetNRows(UInt_t* record) { return GetNChannels(record); }
00052     virtual UInt_t GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow);
00053 
00054     virtual std::string GetDataObjectPath() { return "JAMF:JAMFADC"; }
00055 };
